reviewText: ABC News 20/20 An Agonizng Silence: Mutism. As a first introduction to this topic, it was simple and informative. Would have liked a longer program with other stories of families with other treatment options, especially in the younger set.

This topic was documented and explored adequately. However, is there a follow-up video? Or are there other videos w/in this same genre? The topic was very interesting, but we would like to see a more thorough explanation and description.
